Import packages
```{r packages}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(truncnorm)
library(nlme)
library(parameters)
library(lmerTest)
library(MASS)
library(here)
require(missMethods)
```

# Source the simulation functions 

```{r }
source(here::here("code_custom_functions", "simulation_functions_missing_mcar.R"))
source(here::here("code_custom_functions", "simulation_functions_missing_block.R"))
source(here::here("code_custom_functions", "simulation_functions_missing_extreme_oneside.R"))
source(here::here("code_custom_functions", "simulation_functions_missing_extreme_twosided.R"))
```

# Data missing completely at random 


## AR = 0.3 

### Compliance = 0.4 

#### N = 20, T = 20 

```{r}
set.seed(4)

mcar_03_04_20_20 = AR_simulate_missing_mcar(N = 20,
                    T.obs = 20,
                    Ylag.center = FALSE,
                    b00 = 0, estimate_randomslopes = FALSE,
                    b10 = 0.3,
                    sigma = sqrt(3), 
                    rho = 0, 
                    sigma.v0 = sqrt(3), 
                    sigma.v1 = 0, 
                    rho.v = 0, 
                    alpha = 0.05, 
                    R = 1000, 
                    compliance_mean = 0.4)


saveRDS(mcar_03_04_20_20, file = here::here("results", "sim_c_norandomslopes_noncentered", "mcar_03_04_20_20.rds"))
```
